73eaf221abca1b8244e34b0b9e76ac46 (22:12): ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c: it works for you on XP?

ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (22:13): (on which it works)
1e4ee64444841994c72c2d5293d9734b (22:13): is using XP Professional SP2

73eaf221abca1b8244e34b0b9e76ac46 (22:17): perhaps it requires QT?

ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (22:22): Hmm, doesn't seem to have any more problems than WebKit-OSX at canvas rendering, which is nice, though it's limited to the few bits I'm testing and to my memory of what bits WebKit always breaks on

ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (22:32): http://canvex.lazyilluminati.com/tests/tests/results.html - nothing interestingly different (unlike WebKit-Qt which applies much more creativity to its rendering)
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (22:52): 73eaf221abca1b8244e34b0b9e76ac46: I didn't see that one coming. Did Apple resurrect Yellow Box for Windows?
3e1c1074b5072fb0e507ed33291ed9b1 (22:53): dunno why many pages are broken in Safari 3 beta? e.g. mozilla.org (Safari 2 is ok)
c3fb53c6c6b7a0afb097cd0b6f6d06aa (23:07): anyone been able to get it running under Wine (Safari 3, that is)
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:09): No - I get up to
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:09): ;fixme:shell:URL_ParseUrl failed to parse L""
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:09): wine: Unhandled page fault on read access to 0x00000000 at address 0x6dc6ca5d (thread 0009), starting debugger...
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:09): which isn't very useful
c3fb53c6c6b7a0afb097cd0b6f6d06aa (23:10): well, you got further than me
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:11): (Oh, now it doesn't get far either)
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:11): Have you got as far as / beyond having problems with the C runtime?
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:14): (s/get far/get that far/)
c3fb53c6c6b7a0afb097cd0b6f6d06aa (23:24): err:module:import_dll Library MSVCR80.dll (which is needed by L"C:\\Program Files\\Safari\\icuuc36.dll") not found
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:26): Try http://canvex.lazyilluminati.com/misc/msvcrt.tar.bz2

ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:27): (It doesn't work if you just copy the DLLs into c:\windows\system or something, because Microsoft decided DLLs were far too easy to understand so now there's this SxS system with manifests and everything so that programs have far more ways in which to fail to run without giving decent error messages)
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:28): (and once you've written a program and made it work, you can install VS2005 SP1 and then it all stops again and you have to recompile all your libraries)
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:28): (or at least that's my experience...)
c3fb53c6c6b7a0afb097cd0b6f6d06aa (23:32): well, now I'm up to loading runtime library incorrectly
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:34): "An application has made an attempt to load the C runtime library incorrectly"?
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:35): Hmm, do you have those three .dll and one .manifest file in the same directory as Safari?
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:35): (I only get that message when the manifest is missing)
c3fb53c6c6b7a0afb097cd0b6f6d06aa (23:39): wine: Unhandled page fault on read access to 0x00230000 at address 0x6b262e97 (thread 0009), starting debugger...
c3fb53c6c6b7a0afb097cd0b6f6d06aa (23:39): Unhandled exception: page fault on read access to 0x00230000 in 32-bit code (0x6b262e97).
c3fb53c6c6b7a0afb097cd0b6f6d06aa (23:39): I tried putting them in the windows directory firsdt
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:40): Ah, okay
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:40): I have no idea what to do once it starts getting access violations :-)
c3fb53c6c6b7a0afb097cd0b6f6d06aa (23:41): don't know if there's much we can do
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (23:47): I'm not sure if Apple will be interested in bug reports saying "it doesn't work in Wine"...
